content.text: These are the days before the baby arrives into the world. We are very excited, anxious and maybe even terrified of what is about to come.
It can be for many reasons:

ol: We are brand new parents and we have no experience.
We do not remember what we did with our previous children years before or
We feel that we want to change or improve our parenting and we want to start from the very first moment.

content.text: To provide you with the tools that will make the parenting experience more relaxing and give you confidence right from the start. To bring your baby home knowing that you can do it!
To gain the basic knowledge and learn that you are not alone.

No one is born knowing how to be a parent. In today's society is built on small core families and not in tribes like in the past. We have no one to learn from and this is why we feel that we need help. We want to find an expert to teach us what our extended family canâ€™t (no matter what the reason is. It does not matter).

ul: Family starts with you, as parents. Communication is the key for a good relationship in good times and in hard times. Talk to each other about your feelings, share your thoughts and your fears. Remember NOT to judge your partner when he/she is sharing their feelings. Everyone of us grew up in a different environment and in a different way from the other, we are different people and we need to respect it and learn from one another how to become better parents because our common goal is to be good parents for our kids and we want to do it together.
Ask for help! It takes a village to raise a child. Prepare as much as you can and learn as much as you can before the birth.
Everything and everyone can wait a few weeks after the delivery. If you need alone time, take it. Everyone will understand. But if you feel overwhelmed reach out and welcome people in to help you.
